text: Zvirokwazvo, tinomboona kutendeuka kwechiso chako (Muhammad (SAW)) wakatarisa kudenga. Zvirokwazvo, tichakutendeudza kuQiblah (kwaunotarisa uchinamata) divi richakufadza, nokudaro tendeutsa chiso chako kudivi re Al-Masjid Al-Haraam (nzvimbo tsvene iri kuMakkah). Uye pose pamuri imi vanhu tendeutsai zviso zvenyu (pakunamata) motarisa ikoko. Zvirokwazvo, vanhu vakapiwa Gwaro (maJudha nemaKristu) vanoziva kuti (kutendeuka muchitarisa kuKaâ€™bah kuMakkah pakunamata) ichokwadi kubva kuna Tenzi vavo. Uye Allah havarivari zvose zvavanoita
